name: Chateau Erdre
description:
DESCRIPTION
On the soft shaded banks of the Erdre, the Château offers you its exceptional setting for your wedding or event.
Former stables, old outbuildings of the Castle, exposed beams with hundred-year-old beams, old-fashioned cut Loire stone fireplaces will offer you charm and elegance.
Your guests will always be greeted with warmth and friendliness in this magical and almost secret place.
At the heart of a very pleasant environment between nature and the river, the Château offers its visitors a refined and elegant setting as well as the exclusivity of its lounges for your warm and friendly welcome. Our services will welcome you with all the attention you can expect, while ensuring our most faithful listening and our recognized know-how to assist you in the organization of your reception.
And for you, we will also be able to provide you with:
Quality equipment: Professional furnishings and kitchens available for your caterer to ensure high quality service.
The list of our catering partners, hotels, orchestras, florists, photographers ... a list which is updated every year in order to guide you as best as possible in your choices and according to your wishes.
Located just 9 kilometres from the city centre, we offer a pleasant comfort to visitors thanks to the layout of our lounges, and the natural environment of the banks of the river Erdre.
Our Wedding Rental Package includes:
. The exclusive provision of our major reception rooms
. Furnishings: tables, chairs and greenery
. The Sound of our installations 01 Micro wire
. The Illuminations of the outbuildings and the castle
. Cuisines for the caterer of your choice and by your care
For a total amount of:
3,450.00 € VAT included On Saturday – 2021/22 except in winter 2900,00 € VAT
2,900.00 € VAT included On Friday – 2021/22
1,900.00 € VAT included from Monday to Thursday during the months of July and August-2021/22
370.00 € VAT included for the Salon Ascot in addition - Saturday
900.00 € VAT included - Wedding return on Sunday
Accommodation:
The Chateau works in conjunction with a four star hotel (other hotels available) just three kilometres away and the team can help you book your rooms at the hotel. The hotel has 300 rooms and the number of rooms required can be booked separately to the Chateau.
For more information please do get in touch we will be more than happy to help.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Hotel recommendation list
Marquee available on site
Recommended caterer
Recommended suppliers list available
Recommended wedding planner
Nearest Airport

Golf course nearby
